knimeNode.name: XSLT
knimeNode.shortDescription: Applies XSLT stylesheets on the cells of an XML column.

fullDescription.intro: Applies XSLT stylesheets on the cells of an XML column. The node applies to every cell in the XML column every stylesheet in the XSLT column. The result will be a column with collection cells one cell for every stylesheet or simple cells when use first stylesheet, only is checked.
fullDescription.option: The name of the new column.
The column containing the XML cells.
If checked the XML column does not show up in the output table.
The column with the XSLT stylesheets.
If checked only the first stylesheet of the XSLT stylesheet column is applied. The new column will comprise simple cells and no collection cells.
If checked the output will be XML cells instead of string cells.

ports.inPort: Input table containing at least one XML column.
Input table containing at least one XML column with XSLT stylesheets.
